## Description

Climate Informatics is an open community interested in research combining climate science with approaches from statistics, machine learning and data mining.

Through the annual conference series we hope to stimulate discussion of new ideas, foster new collaborations, grow the community, and accelerate discovery across disciplinary boundaries.
